verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, for a memorial.) O Lord,<WH3068> rebuke<WH3198> me not in Thy wrath;<WH7110> And chasten<WH3256> me not in Thy burning<WH2534> anger.<WH2534>
For Thine arrows<WH2671> have sunk<WH5181> deep<WH5181> into me, And Thy hand<WH3027> has pressed<WH5181> down<WH5181> on me.

There<WH369> is no<WH369> soundness<WH4974> in my flesh<WH1320> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of Thine indignation;<WH2195> There<WH369> is no<WH369> health<WH7965> in my bones<WH6106> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of my sin.<WH9128>
For my iniquities<WH5771> are gone<WH5674> over<WH5674> my head;<WH7218> As a heavy<WH3515> burden<WH4853> they weigh<WH3513> too<WH4480> much<WH3515> for me.
My wounds<WH2250> grow<WH887> foul<WH887> [and] fester.<WH4743> Because<WH4480> <WH6440> of my folly,<WH200>
I am bent<WH9389> over and greatly<WH3966> bowed<WH7817> down;<WH7817> I go<WH1980> mourning<WH6937> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long.
For my loins<WH3689> are filled<WH4390> with burning;<WH7033> And there<WH369> is no<WH369> soundness<WH4974> in my flesh.<WH1320>
I am benumbed<WH6313> and badly<WH3966> crushed;<WH1794> I groan<WH7580> because<WH4480> of the agitation<WH5100> of my heart.<WH3820>
Lord,<WH136> all<WH3605> my desire<WH8378> is before<WH5048> Thee; And my sighing<WH585> is not hidden<WH5641> from Thee.
My heart<WH3820> throbs,<WH5503> my strength<WH3581> fails<WH5800> me; And the light<WH216> of my eyes,<WH5869> even<WH1571> that has gone<WH369> from me.
My loved<WH157> ones and my friends<WH7453> stand<WH5975> aloof<WH4480> <WH5048> from my plague;<WH5061> And my kinsmen<WH7138> stand<WH5975> afar<WH7350> off.

Those who seek<WH1245> my life<WH5315> lay<WH5367> snares<WH5367> [for me]; And those who seek<WH1875> to injure<WH9567> me have threatened<WH1696> destruction,<WH1942> And they devise<WH1897> treachery<WH4820> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long.
But I, like a deaf<WH2795> man,<WH2795> do not hear;<WH8085> And I am like a dumb<WH483> man<WH483> who does not open<WH6605> his mouth.<WH6310>
Yes, I am like a man<WH376> who<WH834> does not hear,<WH8085> And in whose mouth<WH6310> are no<WH369> arguments.<WH9640>
For I hope<WH3176> in Thee, O Lord;<WH3068> Thou wilt answer,<WH6030> O Lord<WH136> my God.<WH430>
For I said,<WH559> "May they not rejoice<WH8055> over me, [Who,] when my foot<WH7272> slips,<WH4131> would magnify<WH1431> themselves against<WH5921> me."
For I am ready<WH3559> to fall,<WH6761> And my sorrow<WH4341> is continually<WH8548> before<WH5048> me.
For I confess<WH5046> my iniquity;<WH5771> I am full<WH1672> of anxiety<WH1672> because<WH4480> of my sin.<WH9128>
But my enemies<WH340> are vigorous<WH2416> [and] strong;<WH6105> And many<WH7231> are those who hate<WH8130> me wrongfully.<WH8267>
And those who repay<WH9608> evil<WH9567> for good,<WH9186> They oppose<WH7853> me, because<WH8478> I follow<WH7291> what<WH9185> is good.<WH9185>
Do not forsake<WH5800> me, O Lord;<WH3068> O my God,<WH430> do not be far<WH7368> from me!
Make<WH2363> haste<WH2363> to help<WH5833> me, O Lord,<WH136> my salvation!<WH8668>
